mapper.select: select BR.review_idx, BR.pro_idx, BR.member_id, BR.review_content, BR.review_title, BR.review_star, BR.review_reg_date, BM.member_img from bec_review BR INNER JOIN bec_member BM ON BR.member_id = BM.member_id where pro_idx = #{pro_idx}
mapper.insert: insert into bec_review (pro_idx, member_id, review_content, review_title, review_star, review_reg_date) values(#{pro_idx}, #{member_id}, #{review_content}, #{review_content}, #{review_star}, now())
